name: Big Band Leaders Quiz | Big Band | 5 Questions

questions.text: What band leader was known for the question 'Is everybody happy'?
questions.explanation:
Ted Lewis.

	Ted played the clarinet and started with the Earl Fuller band in 1915.

questions.text: Who played 'The sweetest music this side of heaven'?
questions.explanation:
Guy Lombardo.

	Guy Lombardo and his Royal Canadians started in 1919.

Bob Crosby.

	He was the youngest brother of Bing.He sang with the group but could not play an instrument.

questions.text: Who led the 'Band of a thousand melodies'?
questions.explanation:
Larry Funk.

	His theme song was 'Rose of Washington Square'. Helen O'Connell got her start singing with this band.

Wayne King.

	His theme song was 'The Waltz You Saved For Me'.
